posts.author: ratty_uk2011
posts.content:
Excuse the resurrect - a question on DR please?

Which of these three stack with each other:

1) x/- from the OC belts of Swordsman etc
2) DwD innate 
3) Epic feat

Wiki is a bit fuzzy on this.

Cheers!

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Hi Ratty - and welcome to the Guild!

The swordsman/ brawler/ archer belts give you resistances to, respectively, slashing, blunt, and piercing damage, but have no effect on other types of damage inflicted (iirc, it's 10 for the lesser belts and 25 for the greater ones).

Innate DwD (and indeed Barbarian) DR does stack with the EDR feats, and applies to all forms of physical damage.

By and large, the belts will be more beneficial at lower levels, but if you're going heavy on DR and EDR you'll probably find better belts to occupy the slot later. However, it's always worth keeping hold of the belts just in case, because their specific types of resistance will stack with the innate stuff and the feats, which can be useful in particularly challenging encounters.

Hope this helps!

Cheers
